   19: %%
   20: -module(edlin_expand_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23:          init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([normal/1, type_completion/1, quoted_fun/1, quoted_module/1, quoted_both/1,
   25:          invalid_module/1, erl_1152/1, get_coverage/1, check_trailing/1, unicode/1,
   26:          filename_completion/1, binding_completion/1, record_completion/1, no_completion/1,
   27:          map_completion/1, function_parameter_completion/1, fun_completion/1]).
   28: -record(a_record,
   29:         {a_field   :: atom1 | atom2 | btom | 'my atom' | {atom3, {atom4, non_neg_integer()}} | 'undefined',
   30:          b_field   :: boolean() | 'undefined',
   31:          c_field   :: list(term()) | 'undefined',
   32:          d_field   :: non_neg_integer() | 'undefined'}).
   33: -record('Quoted_record',
   34:         {'A_field'   :: atom1 | atom2 | btom | 'my atom' | {atom3, {atom4, non_neg_integer()}} | 'undefined',
   35:          b_field   :: boolean() | 'undefined',
   36:          c_field   :: list(term()) | 'undefined',
   37:          d_field   :: non_neg_integer() | 'undefined'}).
   38: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   39: 
   40: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   41:     cleanup(),
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   45:     ok.
   46: 
   47: suite() ->
   48:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   49:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   50: 
   51: all() ->
   52:     [normal, filename_completion, binding_completion, get_coverage, type_completion, 
   53:      record_completion, fun_completion, map_completion, function_parameter_completion,
   54:      no_completion, quoted_fun, quoted_module, quoted_both, erl_1152, check_trailing,
   55:      invalid_module, unicode].
   56: 
   57: groups() ->
   58:     [].
   59: 
   60: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   64:     cleanup(),
   65:     ok.
   66: 
   67: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: cleanup() ->
   74:     [try
   75:          code:purge(M),
   76:          code:delete(M)
   77:      catch _:_ -> ok end || M <- [expand_test, expand_test1, expand_function_parameter,
   78:                                   'ExpandTestCaps', 'ExpandTestCaps1',
   79:                                 complete_function_parameter]].
   80: 
   81: normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   82:     {module,expand_test} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test),
   83:     %% These tests might fail if another module with the prefix
   84:     %% "expand_" happens to also be loaded.
   85:     {yes,"test:",[]} = do_expand("expand_"),
   86:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("expandXX_"),
   87:     {no,[],[#{
   88:                title:="functions",
   89:                elems:=[{"a_fun_name",[{ending,"("}]},
   90:                         {"a_less_fun_name",_},
   91:                         {"b_comes_after_a",_},
   92:                         {"expand0arity_entirely",_},
   93:                         {"module_info",_}]
   94:               }]} = do_expand("expand_test:"),
   95:     {yes,[],[#{title:="functions",
   96:                       elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},{"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test:a_"),
   97:     {yes,"arity_entirely()",[]} = do_expand("expand_test:expand0"),
   98:     ok.
   99: 
  100: to_atom(Str) ->
  101:     case erl_scan:string(Str) of
  102:         {ok, [{atom,_,A}], _} ->
  103:             {ok, A};
  104:         _ ->
  105:             error
  106:     end.
  107: 
  108: type_completion(_Config) ->
  109:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 20}),
  110:     {Time,_} = timer:tc(fun() -> do_expand("erl_pp:expr(") end),
  111:     case Time of
  112:         Time when Time > 5000000 ->
  113:             {skip, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Expansion too slow (~p) on this machine",[Time]))};
  114:         _ ->
  115:             parallelforeach(
  116:             fun(Mod) ->
  117:                     Exports = edlin_expand:get_exports(Mod),
  118:                     [try
  119:                         Str = io_lib:write_atom(Mod) ++ ":" ++ io_lib:write_atom(Func) ++ "(",
  120:                         do_expand(Str)
  121:                     catch E:R:ST ->
  122:                             erlang:raise(E, {R, Mod, Func}, ST)
  123:                     end || {Func, _}<- Exports]
  124:             end, [list_to_atom(M) || {M,_,_} <- code:all_available()]),
  125:             ok
  126:     end.
  127: 
  128: parallelforeach(Fun, List) ->
  129:     case parallelforeach(Fun, List, #{}, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online)) of
  130:         [] -> ok;
  131:         Else -> ct:fail(Else)
  132:     end.
  133: parallelforeach(_Fun, [], Workers, _MaxWorkers) when map_size(Workers) =:= 0 ->
  134:     [];
  135: parallelforeach(Fun, List, Workers, MaxWorkers) when MaxWorkers =:= map_size(Workers);
  136:                                                      List =:= [] ->
  137:     receive
  138:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, normal} ->
  139:             parallelforeach(Fun, List, maps:remove(Ref, Workers), MaxWorkers);
  140: 
  141:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason} ->
  142:             {Arg, NewWorkers} = maps:take(Ref, Workers),
  143:             [{Arg, Reason} | parallelforeach(Fun, List, NewWorkers, MaxWorkers)]
  144:     end;
  145: parallelforeach(Fun, [H|T], Workers, MaxWorkers) ->
  146:     {_Pid, Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> Fun(H) end),
  147:     parallelforeach(Fun, T, Workers#{ Ref => H }, MaxWorkers).
  148: 
  149: filename_completion(Config) ->
  150:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  151:     {ok, CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
  152:     file:set_cwd(DataDir),
  153:     {yes,"e\"",[]} = do_expand("\"visible\\ fil"),
  154:     {no,[],[]} = do_expand("\"visible fil"),
  155:     {no,[],[]} = do_expand("\" "),
  156:     {no,[],[]} = do_expand("\"\""),
  157:     {yes, "e\"", []} = do_expand("\".hidden\\ fil"),
  158:     {yes,"/", []} = do_expand("\".."),
  159:     {yes,"ta/", _} = do_expand("\"../edlin_expand_SUITE_da"),
  160:     {yes,"erl\"",[]} = do_expand("\"complete_function_parameter."),
  161:     R = case {os:type(), file:native_name_encoding()} of
  162:         {{win32,_}, _} -> {skip, "Unicode on filenames in windows are tricky"};
  163:         {_,latin1} -> {skip, "Cannot interpret unicode filenames when native_name_encoding is latin1"};
  164:         _ ->
  165:             {yes,"isible",
  166:             [{"visible file",_},{"visible_file",_},{"visible😀_file",_}]} = do_expand("\"v"),
  167:             {yes,"e\"",[]} = do_expand("\"visible😀_fil"),
  168:             {yes,[],
  169:             [{"../",[]},
  170:             {".hidden file",_},
  171:             {".hidden_file",_},
  172:             {".hidden😀_file",_}]} = do_expand("\"."),
  173:             ok
  174:     end,
  175:     file:set_cwd(CWD),
  176:     R.
  177: 
  178: no_completion(_Config) ->
  179:     %% No autocompletion, and no crashes
  180:     {no, _, _} = do_expand("[{"),
  181:     {no, _, _} = do_expand("a [{"),
  182:     {no, _, _} = do_expand("a [{{"),
  183:     ok.
  184: record_completion(_Config) ->
  185:     %% test record completion for loaded records
  186:     %% test record field name completion
  187:     %% test record field completion
  188:     {yes,"ord{", []} = do_expand("#a_rec"),
  189:     {yes,"uoted_record'{", []} = do_expand("#'Q"),
  190:     {no, [], [#{title:="fields", elems:=[{"a_field",_}, {"b_field",_}, {"c_field",_}, {"d_field",_}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{"),
  191:     {no, [], [#{title:="fields", elems:=[{"a_field",_}, {"b_field",_}, {"c_field",_}, {"d_field",_}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record."),
  192:     {yes,"eld=", []} = do_expand("#a_record{a_fi"),
  193:     {no,[],[#{title:="types",elems:=
  194:              [{"atom1",[]},
  195:               {"atom2",[]},
  196:               {"btom",[]},
  197:               {"'my atom'",[]},
  198:               {"{atom3, ...}",[]}],
  199:              options:=[{hide,title}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field="),
  200:     %% test that an already specified field does not get suggested again
  201:     {no,[],
  202:     [#{title:="fields", elems:=
  203:               [{"a_field",[{ending,"="}]},
  204:                {"b_field",[{ending,"="}]},
  205:                {"c_field",[{ending,"="}]},
  206:                {"d_field",[{ending,"="}]}],
  207:               options:=[highlight_all]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,b},"),
  208:     %% test match argument
  209:     {yes,_,[]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3"),
  210:     {no,[],[#{title:="types",elems:=[{"{atom4, ...}",[]}],options:=[{hide,title}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,"),
  211:     {no,[],[#{title:="types",elems:=[{"integer() >= 0",[]}],options:=[{hide,title}]}]} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,{atom4, "),
  212:     {no,_,_} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,{atom4, 1"),
  213:     {no,_,_} = do_expand("#a_record{a_field={atom3,{atom4, 1}"),
  214:     ok.
  215: 
  216: fun_completion(_Config) ->
  217:     {yes, "/1", []} = do_expand("fun lists:unzip3"),
  218:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("fun lists:unzip3/1,"),
  219:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("lists:unzip3/1"),
  220:     {no, [], [{"2",_},{"3",_}]} = do_expand("lists:seq/"),
  221:     %{yes, ", ", _} = do_expand("lists:all(fun erlang:is_atom/1"),
  222:     {no, [], [#{}]} = do_expand("lists:all(fun erlang:is_atom/1, "),
  223:     ok.
  224: 
  225: binding_completion(_Config) ->
  226:     %% test that bindings in the shell can be completed
  227:     {yes,"ding",[]} = do_expand("Bin"),
  228:     {yes,"ding",[]} = do_expand("file:open(Bin"),
  229:     {yes,"ding",[]} = do_expand("fun (X, Y) -> Bin"),
  230:     %% test unicode
  231:     {yes,"öndag", []} = do_expand("S"),
  232:     {yes,"", []} = do_expand("Ö"),
  233:     ok.
  234: 
  235: map_completion(_Config) ->
  236:     %% test that key suggestion works for a known map in bindings
  237:     {no,[],[{"a_key",[{ending, "=>"}]},{"b_key",_},{"c_key",_}]} = do_expand("MapBinding#{"),
  238:     {yes, "_key=>", []} = do_expand("MapBinding#{b"),
  239:     {yes, "_key=>", []} = do_expand("MapBinding # { b"),
  240:     %% test that an already specified key does not get suggested again
  241:     {no, [], [{"a_key",_},{"c_key", _}]} = do_expand("MapBinding#{b_key=>1,"),
  242:     %% test that unicode works
  243:     ok.
  244: 
  245: function_parameter_completion(Config) ->
  246:     %% test first and second parameter
  247:     %% test multiple arities with same type on first parameter
  248:     %% test multiple arities with different type on first parameter
  249:     %% test that recursive types does not trigger endless loop
  250:     %% test that getting type of out of bound parameter does not trigger crash
  251:     compile_and_load2(Config,complete_function_parameter),
  252:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{title:="complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun/2", elems:=[]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun("),
  253:     {yes,":",[]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun(complete_function_parameter"),
  254:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{title:="types",elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name("),
  255:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name(1,"),
  256:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]}  = do_expand("complete_function_parameter : a_fun_name ( 1 , "),
  257:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name(1,2"),
  258:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name(1,2,"),
  259:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"any()",[]},{"[any() | [Deeplist]]",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_deeplist_fun("),
  260:     {no,[],[#{title:="typespecs",
  261:                 elems:=[#{title:=
  262:                                "complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun(T1)",
  263:                           elems:=[#{title:="types",
  264:                                     elems:=[{"integer()",[]}],
  265:                                     options:=[{hide,title}]}],
  266:                           options:=[{highlight_param,1}]},
  267:                            #{title:=
  268:                                "complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun(T1, T2)",
  269:                             elems:=[#{title:="types",
  270:                                     elems:=[{"integer()",[]}],
  271:                                     options:=[{hide,title}]}],
  272:                             options:=[{highlight_param,1}]},
  273:                             #{title:=
  274:                                 "complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun()",
  275:                             options:=[],
  276:                             elems:=[")"]}],
  277:                 options:=[highlight_all]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun("),
  278:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"true",[]},{"false",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:multi_arity_fun(1,"),
  279:     {no,[],
  280:         [#{elems :=
  281:             [#{elems :=
  282:                     [#{elems := [{"integer()",[]}],
  283:                         options := [{hide,title}],
  284:                         title := "types"}],
  285:                 options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  286:                 title :=
  287:                     "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(T1)"},
  288:                 #{elems :=
  289:                     [#{elems := [{"true",[]},{"false",[]}],
  290:                         options := [{hide,title}],
  291:                         title := "types"}],
  292:                 options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  293:                 title :=
  294:                     "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(B1, T1)"}],
  295:         options := [highlight_all],
  296:         title := "typespecs"}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun("),
  297:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"integer()",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(false,"),
  298:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"{atom1, ...}",[]},
  299:                                               {"atom1",[]},
  300:                                               {"atom2",[]},
  301:                                               {"[atom4 | atom5]",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter("),
  302:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"atom1",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter({"),
  303:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"{integer() >= 0, ...}",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter({atom1,"),
  304:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"atom4",[]},{"atom5",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:advanced_nested_parameter(["),
  305:     {no, [], [#{elems:=[#{elems:=[#{elems:=[{"atom4",[]},{"atom5",[]}]}]}]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter : advanced_nested_parameter ( [ , "),
  306:     {no,[],
  307:     [#{elems :=
  308:            [#{elems :=
  309:                   [#{elems := [{"integer()",[]}],
  310:                      options := [{hide,title}],
  311:                      title := "types"}],
  312:               options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  313:               title :=
  314:                   "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(T1)"},
  315:             #{elems :=
  316:                   [#{elems := [{"true",[]},{"false",[]}],
  317:                      options := [{hide,title}],
  318:                      title := "types"}],
  319:               options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  320:               title :=
  321:                   "complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(B1, T1)"}],
  322:        options := [highlight_all],
  323:        title := "typespecs"}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun("),
  324:     %% Hide results where the type of the first parameters does not match the prototype header
  325:     {no,[],
  326:     [#{title:="typespecs",
  327:         elems:=[#{title:="complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(B1, T1)",
  328:             elems:=[#{title:="types",
  329:                  elems:=[{"integer()",[]}],
  330:                  options:=[{hide,title}]}],
  331:             options:=[{highlight_param,2}]}],
  332:         options:=[highlight_all]}]} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(false,"),
  333:     {no, _, []} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:different_multi_arity_fun(atom,"),
  334:     {yes, _, _} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:'emoji"),
  335: 
  336:     ok.
  337: 
  338: get_coverage(Config) ->
  339:     compile_and_load2(Config,complete_function_parameter),
  340:     do_expand("\""),
  341:     do_expand("\"."),
  342:     do_expand("\"../"),
  343:     do_expand("\"/"),
  344:     do_expand("fun m:f"),
  345:     do_expand("fun m:f/"),
  346:     do_expand("#"),
  347:     do_expand("MapBinding#{"),
  348:     do_expand("B"),
  349:     do_expand("#a_record{"),
  350:     do_expand("#a_record{a_field=>"),
  351: 
  352:     %% match_arguments and is_type tests
  353:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{"),
  354:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a"),
  355:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>"),
  356:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1"),
  357:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,"),
  358:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,d=>err"),
  359:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,d=>error"),
  360:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,d=>error}"),
  361:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>1,b=>2,c=>3,d=>error"),
  362:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{}, "),
  363:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{V=>1}, "),
  364:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:map_parameter_function(#{a=>V}, "),
  365:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:tuple_parameter_function({a,b}, "),
  366:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:tuple_parameter_function({a,V}, "),
  367:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:list_parameter_function([], "),
  368:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:list_parameter_function([atom], "),
  369:     true = {no, [], []} =/= do_expand("complete_function_parameter:list_parameter_function([V], "),
  370:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:non_empty_list_parameter_function([atom], "),
  371:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:non_empty_list_parameter_function([], "),
  372:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:binary_parameter_function(<<0>>, "),
  373:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:binary_parameter_function(<<V>>, "),
  374:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:integer_parameter_function(0, "),
  375:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:non_neg_integer_parameter_function(1, "),
  376:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:neg_integer_parameter_function(-1, "),
  377:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:float_parameter_function(0.1, "),
  378:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:pid_parameter_function(<0.1.0>, "),
  379:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:port_parameter_function(#Port<0.1>, "),
  380:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:record_parameter_function(#a_record{a = 1}, "),
  381:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(#Fun<erl_eval.1.0>, "),
  382:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(fun(X) -> X end, "), %% Todo verify fun arity
  383:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(receive X -> X end, "),
  384:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(V, "),
  385:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function((1+2), "),
  386:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(some_call(), "),
  387:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:function_parameter_function(#Nope<1.0>, "),
  388:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:reference_parameter_function(#Ref<1.0.1.0>, "),
  389:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:any_parameter_function(#Ref<1.0.1.0>, "),
  390:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:ann_type_parameter_function(atom, "),
  391:     true = {no, [], []} =/= do_expand("complete_function_parameter:ann_type_parameter_function2(1, "),
  392:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:atom_parameter_function(atom, "),
  393:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:ann_type_parameter_function(atom"),
  394:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:atom_parameter_function(atom"),
  395:     %% user_defined function
  396:     {yes, "func(", _} =
  397:         do_expand("my_"),
  398:     {no,[],[#{elems :=
  399:             [#{elems :=
  400:                     [#{elems := [{"#my_record",[]}],
  401:                         options := [{hide,title}],
  402:                         title := "types"}],
  403:                 options := [{highlight_param,1}],
  404:                 title := "shell_default:my_func(A)"}],
  405:         options := [highlight_all],
  406:         title := "typespecs"}]} =
  407:         do_expand("my_func("),
  408:     {yes,"=",[]} =
  409:         do_expand("my_func(#my_record{ field"),
  410:     {no,[],
  411:         [#{elems :=
  412:                 [#{elems := [{"a_value",[]},{"b_value",[]}],
  413:                     options := [{separator," :: "},{highlight_all}],
  414:                     title := "erlang:my_type()"}],
  415:             options := [{hide,title}],
  416:             title := "types"}]} =
  417:         do_expand("my_func(#my_record{ field=>"),
  418:     {yes,"ue, ",[]} =
  419:         do_expand("my_func(#my_record{field=>a_val"),
  420:     %% bifs()
  421:     {yes, "st(", _} =
  422:         do_expand("integer_to_li"),
  423:     %% commands()
  424:     {yes, "(", _} =
  425:         do_expand("bt"),
  426:     {yes, ":", _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("complete_function_parameter")),
  427:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("#")),
  428:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("UnbindedMap#")),
  429:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("UnbindedMap#{")),
  430:     {no, [], _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("#{")),
  431:     {yes, "(", _}=edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse("complete_function_parameter:a_fun_name")),
  432: 
  433:     do_expand("fun l"),
  434:     %{yes, ">", _} = 
  435:     do_expand("fun () -"),
  436:     %{yes, "n ", _} =
  437:     do_expand("fun () whe "),
  438:     %{no, [], []} =
  439:     do_expand("fun () when "),
  440:     %{no, [], []} = 
  441:     do_expand("fun () -> "),
  442:     %% {keyword, ...}
  443:     do_expand("M#"),
  444:     do_expand("#non_existant_record"),
  445:     do_expand("#a_record{ non_existand_field"),
  446:     
  447:     
  448:     %% match_arguments coverage
  449:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:integer_parameter_function(atom,"), %% match_argument -> false
  450:     do_expand("complete_function_parameter:a_zero_arity_fun()"), %% match_argument, parameters empty
  451:     do_expand("erlang:system_info(thread"),
  452:     do_expand("erlang:system_info(thread_nope"),
  453:     do_expand("erlang:system_info(threads"),
  454:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priori"),
  455:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority_nope"),
  456:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority, "),
  457:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority, atom"),
  458:     do_expand("erlang:process_flag(priority, 1"),
  459:     do_expand("erlang:system_info({allocator,"),
  460:     do_expand("lists:seq(1"),
  461:     do_expand("lists:seq(1, 10"),
  462:     do_expand("ssh:connect({"),
  463:     do_expand("ssh:connect({255,"),
  464:     do_expand("ssh:connect({'$i"),
  465:     do_expand("ssh:connect({'$x"),
  466:     do_expand("ssh:connect({1000,"),
  467:     do_expand("ssh:connect({255,255,255,255,255,255,255,255"),
  468:     do_expand("ssh:connect({255,255,255,255}, ["),
  469:     do_expand("ssh:connect(receive V -> V end, "),
  470:     do_expand("ssh:connect((1+2), "),
  471:     do_expand("ssh:connect(hej(), "),
  472:     do_expand("ssh:connect(fun() -> ok end, "),
  473:     do_expand("ssh:connect(fun a:b/1, "),
  474:     do_expand("ssh:connect(V, [in"),
  475:     do_expand("ssh:connect(V, [inet"),
  476:     do_expand("ssh:connect(V, [inet, "),
  477:     do_expand("atom_to_list("),
  478:     do_expand("help("),
  479:     do_expand("h(lists"),
  480:     do_expand("ht(lists"),
  481:     do_expand("h(file,"),
  482:     do_expand("ht(file,"),
  483:     do_expand("ht(file,mode"),
  484:     do_expand("file:get_cwd()"),
  485:     do_expand("fl"),
  486:     do_expand("fl("),
  487:     do_expand("fl()"),
  488:     do_expand("MapBinding#"),
  489:     do_expand("RecordBinding#"),
  490:     do_expand("TupleBinding#"),
  491:     do_expand("Binding#"),
  492:     do_expand("MyVar"),
  493:     {_, _, M0} = do_expand("ssh:connect("),
  494:     do_format(M0),
  495:     {_, _, M1} = do_expand("ssh:connect({"),
  496:     do_format(M1),
  497:     {_, _, M6} = do_expand("ssh:connect({},["),
  498:     do_format(M6),
  499:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M6, 20)),
  500:     {_, _, M2} = do_expand("e"),
  501:     do_format(M2),
  502:     {_, _, M3} = do_expand("erlang:i"),
  503:     do_format(M3),
  504:     {_, _, M4} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun("),
  505:     do_format(M4),
  506:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M4, 20)),
  507:     {_,_,M5}=edlin_expand:expand("e"),
  508:     do_format(M5),
  509:     {_,_,M7}=edlin_expand:expand("erlang:"),
  510:     do_format(M7),
  511:     {_,_,M8}=edlin_expand:expand("e"),
  512:     do_format(M8),
  513:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M8, 20)),
  514:     {_,_,M9}=edlin_expand:expand("complete_function_parameter:an_untyped_fun("),
  515:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M9, 20)),
  516:     do_format(M5),
  517:     {_, _, M10} = edlin_expand:expand("ssh:connect({},["),
  518:     do_format(M10),
  519:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(M10, 20)),
  520:     %% Test that we are not filtering duplicates bit with different case or different string lengths
  521:     {yes,"e", M11} = do_expand("complete_function_parameter:cas"),
  522:     "\e[;1;4mfunctions\e[0m\ncaseSensitiveFunction(        casesensitivefunction(        \ncaseSensitiveFunctionName(\n" = do_format(M11),
  523:     ok.
  524: 
  525: %% Normal module name, some function names using quoted atoms.
  526: quoted_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  527:     {module,expand_test} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test),
  528:     {module,expand_test1} = compile_and_load(Config,expand_test1),
  529:     %% should be no colon after test this time
  530:     {yes, "test", [#{title:="modules", elems:=[{"expand_test",[{ending, ":"}]},{"expand_test1",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_"),
  531:     {no, [], []} = do_expand("expandXX_"),
  532:     {no,[],[#{title:="functions",
  533:                      elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  534:                             {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  535:                             {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_},
  536:                             {"a_fun_name",_},
  537:                             {"a_less_fun_name",_},
  538:                             {"b_comes_after_a",_},
  539:                             {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:"),
  540:     {yes,"_",[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  541:                               {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:a"),
  542:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  543:                              {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:a_"),
  544:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  545:                              {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  546:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'"),
  547:     {yes,"uoted_fun_",[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  548:                                        {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'Q"),
  549:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  550:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'Quoted_fun_"),
  551:     {yes,"weird-fun-name'(",[]} = do_expand("expand_test1:'#"),
  552: 
  553:     %% Since there is a module_info/1 as well as a module_info/0
  554:     %% there should not be a closing parenthesis added.
  555:     {yes,"(",[]} = do_expand("expand_test:module_info"),
  556:     ok.
  557: 
  558: quoted_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  559:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps'),
  560:     {yes, "Caps':",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTest"),
  561:     {no,[],[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  562:                             {"a_less_fun_name",_},
  563:                             {"b_comes_after_a",_},
  564:                             {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps':"),
  565:     {yes,[],[#{title:="functions", elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  566:                                                 {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps':a_"),
  567:     ok.
  568: 
  569: %% Test that expansion does not break when module/function is invalid
  570: invalid_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  571: 
  572:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("0"),
  573:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("0:"),
  574:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("0:a"),
  575:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("0:a("),
  576:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("lists:0"),
  577:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("lists:0("),
  578:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("fun 0"),
  579:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("fun 0:"),
  580:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("fun 0:a"),
  581:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("fun 0:a/"),
  582:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("fun lists:0"),
  583:     {no, "", []} = do_expand("fun lists:0/"),
  584:     ok.
  585: 
  586: quoted_both(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  587:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps'),
  588:     {module,'ExpandTestCaps1'} = compile_and_load(Config,'ExpandTestCaps1'),
  589:     %% should be no colon (or quote) after test this time
  590:     {yes, "Caps", [#{elems:=[{"'ExpandTestCaps'",[{ending, ":"}]},{"'ExpandTestCaps1'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTest"),
  591:     {no,[],[#{elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  592:                             {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  593:                             {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_},
  594:                             {"a_fun_name",_},
  595:                             {"a_less_fun_name",_},
  596:                             {"b_comes_after_a",_},
  597:                             {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':"),
  598:     {yes,"_",[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},{"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':a"),
  599:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"a_fun_name",_},
  600:                              {"a_less_fun_name",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':a_"),
  601:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'#weird-fun-name'",_},
  602:                              {"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  603:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'"),
  604:     {yes,"uoted_fun_",[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},{"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'Q"),
  605:     {yes,[],[#{elems:=[{"'Quoted_fun_name'",_},
  606:                              {"'Quoted_fun_too'",_}]}]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'Quoted_fun_"),
  607:     {yes,"weird-fun-name'()",[]} = do_expand("'ExpandTestCaps1':'#"),
  608:     ok.
  609: 
  610: %% Note: pull request #1152.
  611: erl_1152(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  612:     "foo"++"    "++[1089]++_ = do_format(["foo",[1089]]),
  613:     ok.
  614: 
  615: check_trailing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  616:     Str = lists:duplicate(80, $1),
  617:     StrF = do_format([Str]),
  618:     {_, "...\n"} = lists:split(76, StrF),
  619:     ok.
  620: 
  621: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  622:     {module,unicode_expand} = compile_and_load(Config,'unicode_expand'),
  623:     {no,[], [#{elems:=[{"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",_},
  624:                              {"'кlирилли́ческий атомB'",_},
  625:                              {"module_info",_}]}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:"),
  626:     {yes,"рилли́ческий атом", [#{elems:=[{"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",_},
  627:                                               {"'кlирилли́ческий атомB'",_}]}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'кlи"),
  628:     {yes,"еский атом", [#{elems:=[{"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",_},
  629:                                         {"'кlирилли́ческий атомB'",_}]}]} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'кlирилли́ч"),
  630:     {yes,"(", []} = do_expand("unicode_expand:'кlирилли́ческий атомB'"),
  631:     "'кlирилли́ческий атом'     'кlирилли́ческий атомB'    module_info\n" =
  632:         do_format([{"'кlирилли́ческий атом'",[]},
  633:                    {"'кlирилли́ческий атомB'",[]},
  634:                    {"module_info",[]}]),
  635:     ok.
  636: 
  637: do_expand(String) ->
  638:     io:format("~ts", [String]),
  639:     Bs = [
  640:           {'Binding', 0},
  641:           {'MapBinding', #{a_key=>0, b_key=>1, c_key=>2}},
  642:           {'RecordBinding', {some_record, 1, 2}},
  643:           {'TupleBinding', {0, 1, 2}},
  644:           {'Söndag', 0},
  645:           {'Ö', 0}],
  646:     Rt = ets:new(records, []),
  647: 
  648:     Rt2 = [{my_record, {attribute,[{text,"record"},
  649:                         {location,{1,2}}],
  650:                     record,
  651:                     {my_record, [{typed_record_field,{record_field,[{text,"field"},
  652:                                                                             {location,{1,20}}],
  653:                                                                             {atom,[{text,"field"},{location,{1,20}}],field},
  654:                                                                             {atom,[{text,"a_value"},{location,{1,28}}],a_value}},
  655:                                                             {user_type,[{text,"my_type"},{location,{1,33}}],
  656:                                                                         my_type,[]}}]}}}],
  657:     Ft = [{{function,{shell_default,my_func,1}},fun(_A)->0 end},
  658:           {{function_type,{shell_default,my_func,1}},
  659:                 {attribute,[{text,"spec"},{location,{1,2}}],
  660:                 spec,
  661:                 {{my_func,1},
  662:                 [{type,[{text,"("},{location,{1,14}}],
  663:                 bounded_fun,
  664:                 [{type,[{text,"("},{location,{1,14}}],
  665:                 'fun',
  666:                 [{type,[{text,"("},{location,{1,14}}],
  667:                         product,
  668:                         [{var,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,15}}],'A'}]},
  669:                 {type,[{text,"integer"},{location,{1,21}}],integer,[]}]},
  670:                 [{type,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,36}}],
  671:                 constraint,
  672:                 [{atom,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,36}}],is_subtype},
  673:                 [{var,[{text,"A"},{location,{1,36}}],'A'},
  674:            {type,[{text,"#"},{location,{1,41}}],
  675:                 record,
  676:                 [{atom,[{text,"my_record"},{location,{1,42}}],
  677:                         my_record}]}]]}]]}]}}},
  678:         {{type,my_type},
  679:             {attribute,[{text,"type"},{location,{1,2}}],
  680:             type,
  681:             {my_type,{type,[{text,"a"},{location,{1,20}}],
  682:             union,
  683:             [{atom,[{text,"a_value"},{location,{1,20}}],a_value},
  684:             {atom,[{text,"b_value"},{location,{1,24}}],b_value}]},
  685:             []}}}],
  686:     shell:read_and_add_records(edlin_expand_SUITE, '_', [], Bs, Rt),
  687:     edlin_expand:expand(lists:reverse(String), [], {shell_state, Bs, ets:tab2list(Rt)++Rt2, Ft}).
  688: 
  689: do_format(StringList) ->
  690:     lists:flatten(edlin_expand:format_matches(StringList, 79)).
  691: 
  692: compile_and_load2(Config, Module) ->
  693:     Filename = filename:join(
  694:                  proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  695:                  atom_to_list(Module)),
  696:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  697:     c:c(Filename, [debug_info, {outdir, PrivDir}]).
  698: 
  699: compile_and_load(Config,Module) ->
  700:     Filename = filename:join(
  701:                  proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  702:                  atom_to_list(Module)),
  703:     {ok,Module,Bin} = compile:file(Filename, [binary]),
  704:     code:load_binary(Module, Filename, Bin).
